## loadById() function

Load one of the default themes by id. Use config to supply overrides to specific definition blocks

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function loadById(id: string, config?: ThemeConfig): Theme;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | the theme id |
|  config | [ThemeConfig](./core.themeconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> the theme configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Theme](./core.theme.md)
